snippet: Following in the footsteps of the French Open and Wimbledon, the United States Open is increasing singles prize money by 11 percent.
abstract: United States Open tennis tournament is increasing singles prize money by 11 percent; the men’s and women’s champions will each receive $1.9 million, a $100,000 increase; payouts are rising 21 percent in the first round of singles and 19 percent in the second round.
lead_paragraph: Following in the footsteps of the French Open and Wimbledon, the United States Open is increasing singles prize money by 11 percent.
